interface.name: zen_desktop_mode_switcher
interface.description: A singleton global object, through which clients can request to switch desktop mode.

entry.name: no_3d_device
entry.summary: No device found for 3d desktop mode

entry.name: 3d
entry.summary: Mode using virtual environment such as VR

request.name: switch_mode
request.description: Request a server to switch dekstop mode.

event.name: applied
event.description: Notification that a new desktop mode has been applied.

request.name: release
request.description: Using this request, a client can tell the server that it is not going to use the zen_desktop_mode_switcher anymore.
